item.title: Index Websites with Google Search Console
item.description: In this post I’d like to show you how to use the Google Search Console to index your website. The Google Search Console offers tools and reports to help you measure your site’s search traffic and performance, fix issues, and improve Google Search results. For a website to show up in a search engines (e.g. Google, Bing, etc.), the website needs to be indexed by the search engine. This can take between a few days, weeks to even months if indexing is not explicitly requested using the Google Search Console.
